entry.title: As China Reopens Borders, Trafficking of Women and Girls Resumes
entry.content: Covid restrictions had mostly halted the smuggling of Vietnamese women for marriage to Chinese men.

entry.title: Ukraine Hits Russian Defenses From a Distance Before Risking Troops
entry.content: With ground counteroffensive stalled, Kyiv tries to interrupt the Kremlin’s supply lines and degrade its forces.

entry.title: The Military Recruiting Crisis: Even Veterans Don't Want Their Children to Join
entry.content: The Pentagon is scrambling to retain the main pipeline for new service members as disillusioned families steer young people away. This article is part of a series examining the problems confronting America’s military.
